name: US (Han Xue)
description:
US is a short visual novel game about love and friendship.

The story is inspired by real-life stories and this sentence: One person cannot change the whole world, but the world cannot change us either.

                                                                                                                                 

Instructions

Explore the stories through the girls' conversations.

I hope this can be a warm story for people who are finding themselves.

A complete game experience takes not more than 8 minutes depending on reading speed.

The youtube video provides a full playthrough.

                                                                                                                                 

Controls:

Left mouse button click to continue.

For the best experience, I recommend playing this game on full screen.

                                                                                                                                     

Credits:

Han Xue (Me)– Story, Art, Design, Programming

The game is made with Unity and Fungus.

The background music is Winter written by Alexander Nakarada.

                                                                                                                                     

Thank you for viewing and playing!
